en: Narrator: Mummy Pig is watching a keep fit programme on television.
cn: 旁白：猪妈妈正在电视上看健身节目。

en: Potato on TV: ...three and four and, come on now, that’s right. Bend it, stretch it, bend it, stretch it...
cn: 电视里的土豆：……三，四，加油，对了。弯腰，伸展，弯腰，伸展……

en: Daddy Pig: I love watching telly.
cn: 猪爸爸：我喜欢看电视。

en: Daddy Pig: What’s this, Mummy Pig?
cn: 猪爸爸：这是什么，猪妈妈？

en: Mummy Pig: It’s a programme about doing exercises to keep fit.
cn: 猪妈妈：这是一个锻炼身体的节目。

en: Daddy Pig: Thank goodness I don’t have to exercise. I’m naturally fit.
cn: 猪爸爸：幸好我不用锻炼，我天生就很健康。

sentence.en: Thank goodness I don’t have to exercise. I’m naturally fit.
sentence.cn: 幸好我不用锻炼，我天生就很健康。

examples.en: Thank goodness I didn't come late.
Thank goodness it didn't rain.

en: Peppa Pig: You don’t look very fit, Daddy. Your tummy is a bit big.
cn: 小猪佩奇：爸爸，你看起来不太健康，你的肚子有点大。

sentence.en: Your tummy is a bit big.

examples.en: Her dress is a bit big.
This box is a bit big for me to lift.
examples.cn: 这个箱子对我来说有点大。

en: Daddy Pig: I’m very fit. I’ll show you. What shall I do first?
cn: 猪爸爸：我很健康，我给你们看看。我先做什么？

en: Peppa Pig: Touch your toes like this.
cn: 小猪佩奇：像这样摸到你的脚趾。

en: Daddy Pig: Easy.
cn: 猪爸爸：简单。

en: Peppa Pig: Daddy, stop pretending that you can’t touch your toes.
cn: 小猪佩奇：爸爸，别假装你摸不到脚趾。

sentence.en: Stop pretending that you can’t touch your toes.

examples.en: Stop pretending that you are sick.
Stop pretending that you don’t know.

en: Daddy Pig: Er, I’m not pretending, Peppa.
cn: 猪爸爸：呃，我没假装，佩奇。

en: Narrator: Daddy Pig really cannot touch his toes.
cn: 旁白：猪爸爸真的摸不到自己的脚趾。

en: Peppa Pig: Oh dear, Daddy. That’s not very good.
cn: 小猪佩奇：哎呀，爸爸，这可不太好。

en: Daddy Pig: Hmm? Maybe I should do a bit of exercise.
cn: 猪爸爸：嗯？也许我该锻炼一下了。

sentence.en: Maybe I should do a bit of exercise.

examples.en: Maybe I should try harder.
Maybe I should ask for help.

en: Peppa Pig: Yes, Daddy.
cn: 小猪佩奇：是的，爸爸。

en: Daddy Pig: And I will start...tomorrow.
cn: 猪爸爸：我会开始的……明天。

en: Mummy Pig: Daddy Pig, you have to start exercising now.
cn: 猪妈妈：猪爸爸，你现在就要开始锻炼。

sentence.en: You have to start exercising now.

examples.en: You have to start studying now.
You have to start working now.

en: Daddy Pig: Oh.
cn: 猪爸爸：哦。

en: Peppa Pig: Don’t worry, Daddy. I will help you.
cn: 小猪佩奇：别担心，爸爸，我会帮你的。

en: Daddy Pig: Oh, all right.
cn: 猪爸爸：好吧。

en: Daddy Pig: Peppa, you’re in charge of getting me fit. What shall I do first?
cn: 猪爸爸：佩奇，你负责让我健康，我先做什么？

sentence.en: you're in charge of getting me fit

examples.en: You’re in charge of the project.
You’re in charge of the meeting.

en: Peppa Pig: First you must do some press-ups.
cn: 小猪佩奇：首先你要做俯卧撑。

en: Daddy Pig: Easy.
cn: 猪爸爸：简单。

en: Peppa Pig: One. Two.
cn: 小猪佩奇：一，二。

en: Daddy Pig: There.
cn: 猪爸爸：好了。

en: Peppa Pig: Very good, Daddy. Now I want you to do one hundred.
cn: 小猪佩奇：很好，爸爸。现在我要你做一百个。

sentence.en: Now I want you to do one hundred.

examples.en: Now I want you to listen carefully.
Now I want you to try again.

en: Daddy Pig: One hundred?
cn: 猪爸爸：一百个？

en: Peppa Pig: Yes.
cn: 小猪佩奇：对。

en: Mummy Pig: Come on, children. Help me make lunch.
cn: 猪妈妈：来吧，孩子们，帮我做午饭。

en: Daddy Pig: I’ll help as well.
cn: 猪爸爸：我也来帮忙。

sentence.en: I’ll help as well.

examples.en: I’ll join you as well.
I’ll come to the party as well.

en: Peppa Pig: No, Daddy. You’ve got one hundred press-ups to do.
cn: 小猪佩奇：不行，爸爸，你要做一百个俯卧撑。

sentence.en: You’ve got one hundred press-ups to do.

examples.en: You’ve got a lot of homework to do.
You’ve got a meeting to attend.

en: Daddy Pig: Oh. One, two...
cn: 猪爸爸：哦。一，二……

en: Narrator: Mummy Pig, Peppa and George are in the kitchen making lunch.
cn: 旁白：猪妈妈、佩奇和乔治在厨房做午饭。

sentence.en: Mummy Pig, Peppa and George are in the kitchen making lunch.
sentence.cn: 猪妈妈、佩奇和乔治在厨房做午饭。

examples.en: They are in the garden playing.
She is in the living room reading.

en: Daddy Pig: Six...
cn: 猪爸爸：六……

en: Narrator: Daddy Pig is still doing his press-ups.
cn: 旁白：猪爸爸还在做俯卧撑。

sentence.en: Daddy Pig is still doing his press-ups.

examples.en: She is still reading her book.
They are still playing outside.

en: Daddy Pig: Eight...
cn: 猪爸爸：八……

en: Peppa Pig: Daddy is doing very well.
cn: 小猪佩奇：爸爸做得很好。

en: Daddy Pig: Ten...
cn: 猪爸爸：十……

en: Mummy Pig: Yes. I do hope he’s not overdoing it.
cn: 猪妈妈：是啊，我希望他不要做得太多。

sentence.en: I do hope he’s not overdoing it.
sentence.cn: 我希望他不要做得太多。

examples.en: I do hope she’s not feeling unwell.
I do hope they’re not lost.

en: Peppa Pig: I’ll go and see.
cn: 小猪佩奇：我去看看。

en: Daddy Pig: Thirteen, fourteen, fifteen, sixteen, seventeen.
cn: 猪爸爸：十三，十四，十五，十六，十七。

en: Peppa Pig: Daddy Pig! You’re cheating! You should be doing press-ups.
cn: 小猪佩奇：猪爸爸！你在作弊！你应该做俯卧撑。

en: Daddy Pig: Oh, er, there was something interesting on the TV.
cn: 猪爸爸：哦，呃，电视上有有趣的东西。

en: Peppa Pig: Naughty Daddy.
cn: 小猪佩奇：调皮的爸爸。

en: Mummy Pig: Maybe Daddy will have more success with my old exercise bike.
cn: 猪妈妈：也许爸爸用我的旧健身车会更成功。

en: Daddy Pig: Ah ha. This looks like fun. I’ll be able to cycle and watch TV at the same time.
cn: 猪爸爸：啊哈，这看起来很有趣。我可以一边骑车一边看电视。

sentence.en: I’ll be able to cycle and watch TV at the same time.
sentence.cn: 我可以一边骑车一边看电视。

examples.en: I’ll be able to cook and listen to music at the same time.
examples.cn: 我可以一边做饭一边听音乐。

examples.en: I’ll be able to study and take notes at the same time.
examples.cn: 我可以一边学习一边记笔记。

en: Daddy Pig: That’s impossible. This bike is too noisy. I can’t hear the TV.
cn: 猪爸爸：不行，这辆车太吵了，我听不到电视。

en: Mummy Pig: You’ve got to get fit somehow.
cn: 猪妈妈：你总得想办法锻炼。

sentence.en: You’ve got to get fit somehow.

examples.en: You’ve got to finish your homework somehow.
examples.cn: 你总得想办法完成作业。

examples.en: You’ve got to learn to swim somehow.
examples.cn: 你总得想办法学会游泳。

en: Peppa Pig: I know! You can use my bicycle!
cn: 小猪佩奇：我知道！你可以用我的自行车！

en: Mummy Pig: Yes, and then you’ll get some fresh air as well.
cn: 猪妈妈：对，这样你还能呼吸新鲜空气。

sentence.en: you’ll get some fresh air as well.

examples.en: You’ll enjoy the sunshine as well.
You’ll have a good time as well.

en: Narrator: Daddy Pig is going to ride on Peppa’s little bicycle.
cn: 旁白：猪爸爸要骑佩奇的小自行车了。

en: Peppa Pig: Daddy, these are the pedals, these are the brakes, and this is the bell.
cn: 小猪佩奇：爸爸，这是脚踏板，这是刹车，这是铃铛。

en: Daddy Pig: Yes, yes, thank you, Peppa. I know. Bye-bye.
cn: 猪爸爸：好好，谢谢你，佩奇。我知道了，拜拜。

en: Daddy Pig: Easy as pie.
cn: 猪爸爸：小菜一碟。

en: Narrator: Getting fit is quite hard work.
cn: 旁白：锻炼身体其实很辛苦。

sentence.en: Getting fit is quite hard work.

examples.en: Studying is quite hard work.
Cleaning the house is quite hard work.

en: Daddy Pig: Now I can get fit without having to pedal.
cn: 猪爸爸：现在我不用踩踏板也能锻炼了。

sentence.en: I can get fit without having to pedal.
sentence.cn: 我不用踩踏板也能锻炼了。

examples.en: I can learn without having to study too hard.
I can relax without having to do anything.
examples.cn: 我可以不做任何事就放松。

en: Narrator: Daddy Pig is going very fast.
cn: 旁白：猪爸爸骑得很快。

en: Daddy Pig: Oh. Maybe I’d better slow down.
cn: 猪爸爸：哦，也许我该慢点。

en: Daddy Pig: The brakes aren’t strong enough!
cn: 猪爸爸：刹车不够灵！

sentence.en: The brakes aren’t strong enough!

examples.en: The door isn’t strong enough!
The roof isn’t strong enough!

en: Narrator: Daddy Pig has been gone for a long time.
cn: 旁白：猪爸爸出去了很久。

en: Peppa Pig: Mummy, where can Daddy be?
cn: 小猪佩奇：妈妈，爸爸去哪儿了？

sentence.en: Where can Daddy be?

examples.en: Where can George be?
Where can my toy be?

en: Mummy Pig: Don’t worry, Peppa. Daddy must be really enjoying himself to be away for so long.
cn: 猪妈妈：别担心，佩奇，爸爸一定玩得很开心才会这么久不回来。

sentence.en: Daddy must be really enjoying himself to be away for so long.
sentence.cn: 爸爸一定玩得很开心才会这么久不回来。

examples.en: She must be really happy to win the prize.
examples.cn: 她一定很高兴能赢得这个奖。

examples.en: They must be really tired after such a long journey.
examples.cn: 他们一定在这么长的旅程后很累。

en: Peppa Pig: Daddy! Where have you been?
cn: 小猪佩奇：爸爸！你去哪儿了？

en: Daddy Pig: I whizzed all the way down the hill. Then I had to push the bike all the way back up again.
cn: 猪爸爸：我一路冲下山，然后又把自行车推上来。

points.en: push the bike all the way back up

en: Mummy Pig: Oh, poor Daddy Pig.
cn: 猪妈妈：哎呀，可怜的猪爸爸。

en: Daddy Pig: Well at least I’ve done my exercise.
cn: 猪爸爸：至少我锻炼了。

sentence.en: I’ve done my exercise.

examples.en: I’ve done my homework.
I’ve done my chores.

en: Mummy Pig: Yes, for today.
cn: 猪妈妈：是的，今天算锻炼了。

en: Daddy Pig: What do you mean?
cn: 猪爸爸：什么意思？

en: Mummy Pig: You have to do some more exercise tomorrow.
cn: 猪妈妈：你明天还要锻炼。

sentence.en: You have to do some more exercise tomorrow.

examples.en: You have to study harder tomorrow.
You have to practice more tomorrow.

en: Daddy Pig: What?
cn: 猪爸爸：什么？

en: Peppa Pig: Daddy, to get fit you have to exercise every day.
cn: 小猪佩奇：爸爸，要健康就要每天锻炼。

sentence.en: to get fit you have to exercise every day.

examples.en: To learn a language you have to practice every day.
examples.cn: 学语言你必须每天练习。

examples.en: To be good at sports you have to train every day.
examples.cn: 要擅长运动你必须每天训练。

en: Daddy Pig: Oh no.
cn: 猪爸爸：哦不。

en: Peppa Pig: But don’t worry, Daddy. I’ll make sure you do it.
cn: 小猪佩奇：别担心，爸爸，我会监督你的。

points.en: I’ll make sure you do it.

en: Daddy Pig: Yes, I know you will.
cn: 猪爸爸：是的，我知道你会的。
